SEARCH
Module com.marinescu.fxmoney
Package com.marinescu.fxmoney.Model

Class DataHolder

java.lang.Object
com.marinescu.fxmoney.Model.DataHolder
public class DataHolder extends Object
This is a singleton class that holds instances of various objects. It ensures that only one instance of the class is created and accessible throughout the application.
